sentences.sContent: Marjorie stood on the porch with a big yellow rosette tied around the post.
sentences.sCn: 马乔里站在柱子上系着一个巨大的黄色玫瑰花形饰物的门廊里。

words.tran: 蔷薇色的，玫瑰红色的；美好的；乐观的；涨红脸的
玫瑰色的；容光焕发的；乐观的

trans.tranCn: 莲座丛；玫瑰形饰物；[建] 圆花饰
trans.tranOther: a circular  badge  made of coloured  ribbon  that is given to the winner of a competition, or that people in Britain wear to show support for a particular football team or political party
